QuestData.Title: The Hunt For Sylvanas
QuestData.Description: It's true then? Gilneas has lost her favorite son.$B$BWe will mourn when this is all over but not a day sooner.$B$BWe will not allow ourselves the luxury of grief while the enemy still breathes Gilnean air.$B$BMy father's men are ready to strike while we still have the Banshee Queen's trail. Just say the word if you're ready. Liam deserves swift vengeance.
QuestData.LogDescription:
Follow Tobias Mistmantle in the Hunt for Sylvanas.
If you lose Tobias, return to Lorna Crowley and speak with her to call again for his aid.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lorna Crowley at Greymane Square in Gilneas City.
QuestData.RewardText: The Plague? Something so heinous that not even the orcs condone its use? I'd say this warrants notifying King Greymane.
